ygData.subject: Re:RE: [EQ-Monks] Wahoo!
ygData.msgSnippet: Treant fists are one hella hard item for monks to obtain.  As such I feel it should reward us for that hard work: Currently they are 8ac, 3 dex, 5 hps The AC
ygData.messageBody:
Treant fists are one hella hard item for monks to obtain. As such I feel it
should reward us for that hard work:

Currently they are 8ac, 3 dex, 5 hps

The AC is the WONDERFULL part, but I think doubling the dex bonus, and adding
say 15-20 more hp's would not make them game unbalancing items, and would
definitely make them worth the 60-100 hours+ of camping they require.


____________________Reply Separator____________________
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Wahoo!
Author: "Currey; Mick" <mick_currey@...>
Date: 03/10/2000 2:42 PM

From: "Currey, Mick" <mick_currey@...>

CONGRAT's Raean,

You'll have to show them to me the next time I see you.

Thors Blazingfury, Tunare



-----Original Message-----
From: RaceFace [mailto:bean@...]
Sent: Friday, March 10, 2000 2:32 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Wahoo!

From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>

After 48+ hours of camping the goblin alchemist in
Beholder...

<drum roll>

I have my Treant Fists!

Now.. if only they'd do something about the +5 hps. I do
more damage
picking my nose..

They're still cool though. :)

- Raean Bloodyhands, 28th monk, Sifu of the Fists of Fury,
Tunare.
